entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
